entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers early this evening then 40 percent chance of flurries later this evening. Clearing late this evening. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late this evening then becoming light before morning. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
